ProtobufIOUtil: Write the message to the output stream using the provided protocol buffer output (ProtobufOutput) and LinkedBuffer. Then, return the size of the message.
StringSerializer: A static method for writing UTF-8 encoded character sequences is needed. Its functionality includes checking if the given object can accommodate the character sequence to be written.
CodedInput: Implement functionality to read a string from a data stream
WriteSession: Convert data from a LinkedBuffer into a byte array and return it.
